column3: Non verified data based on measurements
column4: Non verified data partly based on estimates

column2: Representative data from all relevant sites
column3: Representative data over more than 90% of relevant sites
column4: Representative data over more than 75% relevant sites
column5: Representative data over more than 50% relevant sites

column2: Representative data over the complete year of measurement
Strictly less than 1 year between dataset and intented measurement
column3: Strictly less 2 years between dataset and intented measurement
column4: Stricty less than 3 years between dataset and intented measurement
column5: Strictly less than 4 years between dataset and intented measurement
column6: Unknown, or more than 5 years between dataset and intented measurement

column2: Dataset fits the exact area of the intented measurement
column3: Dataset fits the exact area than the intented measurement
column4: Dataset stems from a similar area to that of the intented measurement
column5: Dataset stems from a sligthtly similar area to that of the intented measurement
column6: Dataset stems from a distinct area to that of the intented measurement or data geographical scope is unknown.

column2: Data stems from entreprises, processes and materials under study
column3: Data stems from process and materials under study, but different production sites
column4: Data stems from processes and materials under study but different technology
column5: Data stems from related processes and materials
column6: Data stems from processes on laboratory scale or a different technology
